name: Pink Room
longDes: You are in the pink room. The walls appear faded, almost dusty pink. There is a window to the North through which you can see the rose gardens, a fountain, and the gazebo. The floor is spattered a bit with paint. An ^easel# and small table stand beside the window. There is a ^loom# and some bins filled with cloth along the wall opposite the window. You feel a ringing in your ears as you stand here. A small and steep staircase leads $up# into the attic. A door to the $West# leads to the red room. Another door to the $East# leads to the green room.
shortDes: You are standing in the pink room, which serves as the art studio. You notice an ^easel# near a window facing north, overlooking the rose gardens.  A ^loom# occupies the room along the wall opposite. There is a door to the $West# leading to the red room, a door to the $East# leading to the green room, and a steep staircase heading $up#.

startingItems.name: paintbrush
startingItems.description: The paintbrush is ready to use.

features.name: easel
features.preActionDes: This easel holds a blank canvas. There is a small table next to it, splattered with long-dry paint.
features.inActionDes:
You begin to paint. Your hand moves as if independant of you.

You finish the painting. It's a dog. It's eyes look dead.

You begin to hear music playing from somewhere to the south, the area of the landing you think.
features.postActionDes: Your painting of the dog stands on the easel. Its eyes look hollow and dead.

features.name: loom
features.preActionDes: You look at the loom. It looks complex and you don't know where to begin with it. Best to leave it alone.
